topic.title: Reading Tool Settings
topic.section: There is a set of Optional Tools available - Abstract, About the author, How to cite item, Indexing metadata, Supplementary files, Print version, Look up terms, Notify a colleague, Email the author, Find references, Add comment. The selected ones will appear in a frame to the right of items in tracks of conference that are indexed. For each discipline- and field-based related items, there is a range of contexts providing access, each of which is utilized by a range of searches. Contexts can be added or deleted, and context metadata can be edited to enable various options; searches for each context can also be added or deleted, and edited in its URLs.
